name: Marble Dividers
author: Zakharias999
description: A module where you "drop" marbles from six different channels with each channel having different conditions. some conitions will be based on the serial number's last character a vowel or the last digit being even, the marbles color (black, white, etc.) or type (metel, glass, etc.) , the instrument displayed on the button for the corresponding channel, and or the number of marbles in the channel.
notes: Recommend watching Wintergatan's progress on the Marble Machine X for reference and inspiration. [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLLYkE3G1HED6rW-bkliHbMroHYFf4ukv]
